lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, the three-time Tour de France winner, said the banned substances found in his doping test were the result of food contamination.
snippet: Alberto Contador, the three-time Tour de France winner, said the banned substances found in his doping test were the result of food contamination.

headline.main: Positive Test for Contador May Cost Him Title
headline.seo: Contador Says Contaminated Meat Caused Positive Drug Test
headline.print_headline: Contador Blames Tainted Meat For Cycling’s Latest Black Eye

byline.contributor: Juliet Macur reported from Washington. Andrés Cala contributed reporting from Madrid, Katie Thomas from New York and Matthew Saltmarsh from Paris.
